lines.text: You know what bothers me about these two guys DeVries and Miller?
Neither has a criminal record. They both lead normal lives until a few days ago, and now they're killing people.
Do you read minds or was that just a shot in the dark?
Oh yeah? What was I just thinking?
Not really. Quite simple to read.
Detective Beck. No one deserves to die like that. I don't care what the man's done.

He killed twelve people, wounded twenty three more, stole six cars, most of them Ferraris. Robbed eight banks, six supermarkets, four jewelery stores and a candy shop. Six of the ones he killed he carved up with a butcher knife. Two of them were kids. He did all that in two weeks. If anyone deserves to go that way, it sure in the hell was him.

Look, Ed, Tom Beck is the best I've got. If I give him to you, I'll never get him back again. My department will then crumble, crime will run rampant, the city will fall into ruin, rampaging hordes will control the streets, and life as we know it will end.
Yo, hippy, what kind of dude are you?
Doesn't anyone say please any more?
[Lloyd takes Beck for a ride in his Porsche]
Bureau must be paying pretty good these days.
Mind me asking how much one of these costs?
You don't know? What did you do, steal it?
Oh, thank you. That is illuminating. That solves everything. Christ, Miller doesn't have a chance. Hey, why would he come in here and kill a guy for a lousy hundred bucks and a radio?
Because he likes it. He sees something he wants, he steals it. If something gets in his way, he kills it. And right now, he's hiding out in your city.
A flame-thrower man, can you believe it? Patrol picked this up off some homeboy on the street.
I want to ask you if I'm crazy, or does this seem just a little bizarre?
I knew that. I just wanted to know if you knew that.
I'd be safer if you didn't.
Do you want me to fucking cover you or not?
I need you to cover me.
Alhague, how do you like being human?
[At this revelation, Tom Beck looks at Lloyd. Lloyd looks back]
Better than being Altairian. Altairians are a filthy people. We could take over this place if we wanted. They have nothing here to stop us.
You left an angry partner for dead on Altair.
